dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HJ 84 IH: Providing for congressional disapproval of the proposed foreign military sale to Israel of certain defense articles and services.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Jayapal (for herself, Ms. Tlaib, Mr. Casar, Mr. García of Illinois, Mr. Green of Texas, Mr. Johnson of Georgia, Ms. Lee of Pennsylvania, Ms. Ocasio-Cortez, Ms. Omar, Ms. Pingree, Mr. Pocan, Ms. Pressley, Mrs. Ramirez, Ms. Velázquez, and Mrs. Watson Coleman) submitted the following joint resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: Providing for congressional disapproval of the proposed foreign military sale to Israel of certain defense articles and services.

section.text: That the following proposed foreign military sale to Israel is prohibited:

paragraph.text: The sale of the following defense articles and services, described in Transmittal No. 24â€“38, submitted to Congress pursuant to section 36(b)(1) of the Arms Export Control Act (22 U.S.C. 2776(b)(1)), and published in the Congressional Record on March 3, 2025: D9R and D9T Caterpillar bulldozers; spare and repair parts; corrosion protection; publications and technical documentation; pre-delivery inspections; U.S. Government and contractor support; technical and logistics support services; storage; and other related elements of logistics and program support.
